name: TPPC v8: Halloween
description:
An actively updated 'Halloween' themed layout for TPPC. 

If you have any suggestions, send a PM to 'pokemonxdofdarkness' on the forums.
additional_info: Update 1.1 (August 14, 2016) * I missed some styling on the Pokedex Entries page, but this update fixes it. Update 1.0 (August 11, 2016) * Added styling to the battle page as I derped out and forgot about it.
